customMessages.headerTitle: COVID-19 situation in the United States of America
customMessages.copyLinkText: The page link has been copied on your clipboard
customMessages.liveText: In the US, as of {date}*, there have been {confirmed} confirmed cases of COVID-19, including {deaths} deaths
customMessages.requestDateMessage: * date referred to the latest data request
customMessages.builtWithAttribution:
Built with MapStore by GeoSolutions. Code available here and release under Simplified BSD License.

The boundaries and names shown and the designations used on this map do not imply the expression of any opinion whatsoever on the part of GeoSolutions concerning the legal status of any country, territory, city or area or of its authorities, or concerning the delimitation of its frontiers or boundaries.
customMessages.sourcesAttribution:
US countries data provided by The COVID Tracking Project API
Kudos to them.

totalsCount.title: Totals Counter
totalsCount.text: Counters display total values related to COVID-19 in the US. Click on one or more (maximum 3 cards) to see values of single states in the States Table on the left

liveText.title: Live Text
liveText.text: This text highlights values of confirmed and deaths counts referred to latest request date

mapContainer.title: Map Viewer
mapContainer.text: The viewer provide a map and tools to navigate COVID-19 data.

statesTable.title: States Table
statesTable.text: This table shows values for properties selected in the Counters for each available state. Click on a state name to highlight it on the map or click on the table header to sort contents.

refreshButton.title: Refresh Time
refreshButton.text: This dropdown provides options for time interval between request updates

shareButton.title: Share
shareButton.text: Click on the share button to copy the url of current view in the clipboard
